title: ngrx-ducks Duck Options Schema
description: Creates a new Duck in the given or default project.

name.x-prompt: What name would you like to use for the Duck?

path.description: The path at which to create the Duck, relative to the workspace root.

barrel.description: When true (the default) and not flat, creates a index.ts barrel file.
barrel.x-prompt: Do you want to create a barrel (index.ts) file?

flat.description: When true, creates files at the top level of the project.

spec.description: When true (the default), generates a  "spec.ts" test file for the new Duck.

effects.description: When true (the default), generates an  "effects.ts" file for the new Duck.
effects.x-prompt: Do you want to create effects?

selectors.description: When true (the default), generates a  "selectors.ts" file for the new Duck.
selectors.x-prompt: Do you want to create selectors?
